pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, January 11, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Regina, Saskatchewan

9:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a roundtable discussion regarding fresh water management, and will deliver brief remarks. Minister of Public Safety and Emergency Preparedness Ralph Goodale will participate.

Saskatchewan Room, Convention Level
The Hotel Saskatchewan
2125 Victoria Avenue

Notes for media:

    • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the roundtable for remarks
    • Media should arrive to the Wascanca Room on the Conference Level, no later than 8:45 a.m.

11:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will make an announcement regarding geothermal energy development. A media availability will follow. Minister of Public Safety and Emergency Preparedness Ralph Goodale will participate.

Subsurface Geological Laboratory
201 Dewdney Avenue East

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage
    • Media should arrive through the main doors at the reception area no later than 10:15 a.m.
